original_text: Yet ye have not hearkened unto me, saith the Lord; that ye might provoke me to anger with the works of your hands to your own hurt.
korean_text: 너희가 내 말을 순종하지 아니하고 너희 손으로 만든 것으로써 나의 노여움을 일으켜 스스로 해하였느니라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: Yet ye have not hearkened unto me,
that ye might provoke me to anger
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너희가 나를 분노하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: with the works of your hands
